abstract: The message of Occupy Wall Street is clear: demonstrators are seeking accountability from corporate America for the financial crisis and the growing economic inequality gap.
snippet: The message of Occupy Wall Street is clear: demonstrators are seeking accountability from corporate America for the financial crisis and the growing economic inequality gap.
lead_paragraph: "I think a good deal of the bankers should be in jail."

headline.main: On Wall Street, a Protest Matures
